keys:
les mammifères, placentalia, impair-ont botté des ungulates 
avec la pointe du pied

i mammiferi, placentalia, dispari-hanno piantato i ungulates di 
traverso

los mamíferos, placentalia, impar-tocaron con la punta del pie 
ungulates

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>ac731560-2250-42e3-b4bc-db50da9d65a5#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Orrszarvú</string>
            <string language="en">Rhinoceros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rhinoceros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rhinocéros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rhinoceros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rhinoceros</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρινόκερος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rinoceronte</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Orrszarvúról készült felvétel, a páratlanujjú patások közé tartozik. Az afrikai szavannákon honos.</string>
            <string language="en">Snapshot taken on rhinoceros, belongs to odd-toed ungulates. Native on African savannas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  méhlepényesek,  páratlanujjú patások,  </string>
            <string language="en">mammals, placentalia, odd-toed ungulates</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Snapshot, der auf Rhinoceros genommen wird, 
gehört ungerad-odd-toed ungulates. Eingeborener auf 
afrikanischen savannas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'instantané pris sur le rhinocéros, appartient 
aux ungulates impair-bottés avec la pointe du pied. Indigène 
sur des savannas africains.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O instantâneo feito exame no rhinoceros, 
pertence aos ungulates impar-odd-toed. Nativo em savannas 
africanos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La fotografia istantanea presa sul rhinoceros, 
appartiene ai ungulates dispari-piantati. Nativo sui savannas 
africani.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το στιγμιότυπο που λαμβάνεται στο ρινόκερο, ανήκει 
περίεργος- ungulates. Ντόπιος στα αφρικανικά savannas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La foto tomada en rinoceronte, pertenece a los 
ungulates impar-tocados con la punta del pie. Natural en 
savannas africanos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säugetiere, placentalia, ungerad-odd-toed ungulates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les mammifères, placentalia, impair-ont botté des ungulates 
avec la pointe du pied</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os mamíferos, placentalia, impar-odd-toed ungulates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i mammiferi, placentalia, dispari-hanno piantato i ungulates di 
traverso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τα θηλαστικά, placentalia, περίεργος- ungulates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los mamíferos, placentalia, impar-tocaron con la punta del pie 
ungulates</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
